title: Watch: Messi the dog, who played Snoop in the film ‘Anatomy of a Fall’, attends Oscars luncheon
content:
Messi, who plays Snoop the Dog in "Anatomy of a Fall," appears to be a bit tired of doing press at the Oscars Luncheon. pic.twitter.com/5DHLRf0rpw— Variety (@Variety) February 12, 2024


Best Supporting Actor nominee Ryan Gosling meeting the dog from Anatomy of a Fall and his heart skips a beat.@Variety @TheAcademy #Oscars pic.twitter.com/9TE9LeZPez— Clayton Davis (@ByClaytonDavis) February 12, 2024


Emma Stone praises the acting chops of Snoop, the dog from "Anatomy of a Fall" | Oscars Luncheon pic.twitter.com/prHTFS41nT— Variety (@Variety) February 13, 2024


ANATOMY OF A FALL’s Messi at the Academy Award Nominees Luncheon. pic.twitter.com/ujVYwoRvz7— A Shot. (@justashottt_) February 12, 2024
author: Scroll Staff
